card.name: Aggravated Assault
card.text: {3}{R}{R}: Untap all creatures you control. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Aggravated Assault
card.text: {3}{R}{R}: Untap all creatures you control. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Curiosity
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

card.name: Doubling Season
card.text: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead. If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

card.name: Doubling Season
card.text: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead. If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

card.name: Greater Auramancy
card.text: Other enchantments you control have shroud. (A permanent with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Enchanted creatures you control have shroud.

card.name: Greater Auramancy
card.text: Other enchantments you control have shroud. (A permanent with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Enchanted creatures you control have shroud.

card.name: Necropotence
card.text: Skip your draw step. Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard. Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

card.name: Necropotence
card.text: Skip your draw step. Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard. Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

card.name: Prismatic Omen
card.text: Lands you control are every basic land type in addition to their other types.

card.name: Rhystic Study
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {1}.

card.name: Rhystic Study
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {1}.

card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {1}.

card.name: Smothering Tithe
card.text: Whenever an opponent draws a card, that player may pay {2}. If the player doesn't, you create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Smothering Tithe
